title: Feminist Movie Friday: Black Christmas
itunes:title: Feminist Movie Friday: Black Christmas
description:
SMNTY brings the holiday cheer with a double feature of Black Christmas, the original and most recent reboot. We talk feminism, misogyny and the power of women supporting women.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
